mapper.select: SELECT C.COMM_IDX AS commentIdx, C.BOARD_IDX AS boardidx, C.COMM_DATE AS commentDate, C.COMM_CONT AS commentContent, M.MEM_IDX AS memberIdx, M.MEM_NM AS memberName FROM COMMENT C, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_IDX = C.MEM_IDX AND BOARD_IDX = #{boardIdx}

SELECT C.COMM_IDX AS commentIdx, C.BOARD_IDX AS boardidx, C.COMM_DATE AS commentDate, C.COMM_CONT AS commentContent, M.MEM_IDX AS memberIdx, M.MEM_NM AS memberName FROM COMMENT C, MEMBER M WHERE M.MEM_IDX = C.MEM_IDX AND BOARD_IDX = #{boardIdx} ORDER BY COMM_IDX DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENT (BOARD_IDX, MEM_IDX, COMM_CONT) VALUES (#{boardIdx}, #{memberIdx}, #{commentContent})
